author: Caroline Chan
title: 'We will deliver right to the border': B.C. town vows to look after U.S. neighbours during pandemic
description: Residents of a small B.C. border town have pledged to help their Alaskan neighbours during the COVID-19 crisis, even as the border between Canada and the United States closes to non-essential travel.
content:
Residents of a small B.C. border town have pledged to help their Alaskan neighbours during the COVID-19 crisis, although the border between Canada and the United States is closed to non-essential travel.
